short.ar: برنامج نصي للكلام / الملقن / مساعد الترجمة.
short.es: Un genial asistente de guión de voz/teleprompter/subtítulos.
short.it: Un fantastico script vocale/teleprompter/assistente per i sottotitoli.
short.ja: クールなスピーチスクリプト/テレプロンプター/字幕アシスタント。
short.zh_CN: 一个酷酷的演讲稿/提词器/字幕助手。
short.zh_TW: 一個很酷的演講腳本/提詞器/字幕助手。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a cool speech script/teleprompter/subtitle assistant.

It can help users easily collect articles or sentences selected by users on web pages and include them in speech drafts. The speech draft can then be customized and edited, and the final speech can be opened on the podium page.

After the podium page is opened, the user can control playback and pause, fast and slow speed, etc. It is usually used for press release speeches, article readings, or other scenes that require dynamic subtitles.

Two speech styles are currently available: rolling and lyrical. Subsequent changes and optimization may be made based on user feedback.

If you like it, please give it a good rating, thank you very much!

For more feedback, please leave a message in the message box or send an email to the author. The author will be grateful!
